name: Workforce Development Board of Contra Costa County
description: Free career counseling, job training, and employment services in Contra Costa County
fullDescription: Contra Costa County's America's Job Centers offer free employment services including career counseling, job training, and placement assistance.
whatTheyOffer:
- Career counseling and job search assistance
- Resume writing and interview skills workshops
- Occupational skills training
- Youth employment programs
- Veteran employment services
- Employer connections and job fairs
- Supportive services
howToGetIt:
1. Visit an America's Job Center
2. Locations in Richmond, Concord, and Antioch
3. Register and complete assessment
4. Work with career counselor
5. Access training and employment services
keywords: Contra Costa, workforce, AJCC, America's Job Center, job training, career services, Richmond, Concord, Antioch
